name: com.yourname.emoji-replacer
description: A high-performance Unicode emoji replacement system for TextMeshPro using sprite assets. Supports composite emojis including ZWJ sequences, skin tone modifiers, and regional indicators.

samples.description: Complete working example with Twemoji sprites and native mobile input support. Requires UMI (https://github.com/mopsicus/umi.git) for native input field functionality.
Minimal example showing core emoji replacement functionality without external dependencies.
